title: Minor Psychiatric Morbidity and General Practice Consultations: The West London Survey. By P. Williams, A. Tarnopolsky, D. Hand and M. Shepherd. (Pp. 37; illustrated; £2.50.) Cambridge University Press: Cambridge. 1986.
